snippet: Lanny Breuer, Eliot Spitzer and Mary Jo White delved into whether the authorities had done enough to bring criminal cases in the aftermath of the financial crisis during a New York University panel discussion.
abstract: Lanny Breuer, Eliot Spitzer and Mary Jo White delved into whether the authorities had done enough to bring criminal cases in the aftermath of the financial crisis during a New York University panel discussion.
lead_paragraph: Did felons get a free pass in the financial crisis?

headline.main: A Star Panel Debates Financial Crisis Prosecutions
